title: Beginners please
creator_credit: Donald Carter, British Film Institute, Gaumont-British Instructional and Exclusive Films
brief_description: All physical training must be begun gently; gymnastics should be started with light excerises. This film demonstrates games designed to ease the muscles before going on to more strenuous and involved movements.
creator_credit_for_label: Donald Carter, British Film Institute, Gaumont-British Instructional and Exclusive Films
